reviews.review_msg: This was the most difficult online course I have taken at SFU. In addition to the weekly quizzes, weekly group assignments were required in essay style. The TAs were also difficult markers and didn't provide clear feedback upon meeting them for a regrade. Don't take this course if you're looking for a GPA booster or an elective, it's not worth it.
yeah no... save urself from this class. take something else
